import { Typography, Row, Col, Statistic, Button } from "antd" import millify from "millify" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" import { useState } from "react" import Cryptocurrencies from "./Cryptocurrencies" import News from "./News" const {Title} = Typography const Homepage = ({coin , market}) =>{ console.log(coin) // let [coin, SetCoin] = useState(0); // let [market, SetMarket] = useState(0); return( <> {/* Global Crypto Stats {coin === 0 && market === 0? Data를 가져와 주세요 : }
Top 10 Cryptocurrencies in the world <Link to="/cryptocurrencies"/>Show More
Latest Crypto News <Link to="/News"/>Show More
*/} ) } export default Homepage
